headline.main: Uber Driver Charged With Sex Assault on Chicago Passenger
headline.print_headline: Uber Driver Charged With Sex Assault on Chicago Passenger

docs.snippet: A driver for the ride-sharing service Uber has been charged with kidnapping and sexually assaulting a passenger in Chicago....
docs.lead_paragraph: A driver for the ride-sharing service Uber has been charged with kidnapping and sexually assaulting a passenger in Chicago.

headline.main: Yosemite Climbers Reach Top of El Capitan in Historic Ascent
headline.print_headline: Yosemite Climbers Reach Top of El Capitan in Historic Ascent

docs.snippet: Two climbers completed a historic 19-day ascent to the summit of Yosemite National Park's El Capitan in California on Wednesday after scaling the rock formation's 3,000-foot (900-metre) sheer granite face without climbing tools, representatives sa...
docs.lead_paragraph: Two climbers completed a historic 19-day ascent to the summit of Yosemite National Park's El Capitan in California on Wednesday after scaling the rock formation's 3,000-foot (900-metre) sheer granite face without climbing tools, representatives said.

headline.main: What Would You Grab in a Fire?
headline.print_headline: What Would You Grab in a Fire?

docs.snippet: My son — but also, my toothbrush, my computer and a knife....
docs.abstract: My son — but also, my toothbrush, my computer and a knife.

headline.main: Anti-Olympics Group Holds 1st Public Meeting in Boston
headline.print_headline: Anti-Olympics Group Holds 1st Public Meeting in Boston

docs.snippet: In order to start the first public meeting — pro or con — since Boston was chosen as the American nominee for the 2024 Olympics, the head of the group opposed to bringing the Summer Games here asked those in the crowd to raise their ha...
docs.lead_paragraph: In order to start the first public meeting — pro or con — since Boston was chosen as the American nominee for the 2024 Olympics, the head of the group opposed to bringing the Summer Games here asked those in the crowd to raise their hands and stop talking.

headline.main: Hawaiian Host Buys Mauna Loa in Macadamia Nut Consolidation
headline.print_headline: Hawaiian Host Buys Mauna Loa in Macadamia Nut Consolidation

docs.snippet: Hawaiian Host, maker of chocolate-covered macadamia nuts, said it's buying macadamia nut processor Mauna Loa from The Hershey Co....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hawaiian Host, maker of chocolate-covered macadamia nuts, said it's buying macadamia nut processor Mauna Loa from The Hershey Co.

headline.main: Florida Man Sentenced to 20 Years for Seeking to Join Al Qaeda Group
headline.print_headline: Florida Man Sentenced to 20 Years for Seeking to Join Al Qaeda Group

docs.snippet: A Florida man was sentenced to two decades in prison on Wednesday for conspiring to train for an Islamic holy war or jihad and traveling to the Middle East intending to fight with an al Qaeda-affiliated group, according to court records....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Florida man was sentenced to two decades in prison on Wednesday for conspiring to train for an Islamic holy war or jihad and traveling to the Middle East intending to fight with an al Qaeda-affiliated group, according to court records.

headline.main: Cosby performance canceled, "Transformers" leads worst films
headline.sub: Cosby performance canceled, "Transformers" leads worst films

docs.snippet: The day's top showbiz news and headlines, including a Bill Cosby performance cancellation, Anita Ekberg is remembered, and "Transformers: Age of Extinction" leads worst film nominations. Phil Furey reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: The day's top showbiz news and headlines, including a Bill Cosby performance cancellation, Anita Ekberg is remembered, and "Transformers: Age of Extinction" leads worst film nominations. Phil Furey reports.

headline.main: Paris Gunman's Safe House Could Hold Clues to 4th Attacker
headline.print_headline: Paris Gunman's Safe House Could Hold Clues to 4th Attacker

docs.snippet: Amedy Coulibaly, the gunman who killed four hostages at a Paris kosher supermarket, rented a small suburban house the week before and filled it with an impressive arsenal of late-model weapons, police said Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Amedy Coulibaly, the gunman who killed four hostages at a Paris kosher supermarket, rented a small suburban house the week before and filled it with an impressive arsenal of late-model weapons, police said Wednesday.

headline.main: Brisbane Pitch a 'Disgrace', Says Australia Forward Kruse
headline.print_headline: Brisbane Pitch a 'Disgrace', Says Australia Forward Kruse

docs.snippet: Australia forward Robbie Kruse has joined China coach Alain Perrin in criticising the playing surface at Brisbane's Lang Park ahead of the Socceroos' final Asian Cup group match against South Korea at the venue....
docs.lead_paragraph: Australia forward Robbie Kruse has joined China coach Alain Perrin in criticising the playing surface at Brisbane's Lang Park ahead of the Socceroos' final Asian Cup group match against South Korea at the venue.
